code: import{FRIENDS}from"../constants/action-types";var initialState={friends:[]};var friendsReducer=function friendsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case FRIENDS:return Object.assign({},state,{friends:action.payload});default:return state;}};export default friendsReducer;
